edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart

Class PPLineChart

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart.PPChart
      • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart.PPLineChart

  • public class PPLineChart
extends PPChart
    This class represents a line graph on a slide.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPLineChart(PPSlide slide, double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new PPLineChart object with the specified bounds.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PPLineChart

        public PPLineChart(PPSlide slide,
                   double x,
                   double y,
                   double width,
                   double height)
        Creates a new PPLineChart object with the specified bounds.
        Parameters:
        slide - The PPSlide object on which this chart appears
        x - The left side of the bounding box
        y - The top side of the bounding box
        width - The width of the bounding box
        height - The height of the bounding box

    • Method Detail

      • addDataSeries

        public PPGroup addDataSeries(double[] values,
                             Color color)
        Adds a PPGroup shape that contains a complete data series in the line chart. Data points are not indicated with this version of the call.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of values in chart space
        color - The color of the line
        Returns:
        The shape corresponding to the data series

      • createDataSeries

        public PPGroup createDataSeries(double[] values,
                                Color color)
        Creates a PPGroup shape that contains a complete data series in the line chart. Data points are not indicated with this version of the call.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of values in chart space
        color - The color of the line
        Returns:
        The shape corresponding to the data series

      • addDataSeries

        public PPGroup addDataSeries(double[] values,
                             Color color,
                             PPShapeFactory markerFactory)
        Adds a PPGroup shape that contains a complete data series in the line chart. The points are indicated by shapes created by the markerFactory parameter, which should return a shape whose origin is at the center of the figure.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of values in chart space
        color - The color of the line
        markerFactory - The factory that create the marker shape
        Returns:
        The shape corresponding to the data series

      • createDataSeries

        public PPGroup createDataSeries(double[] values,
                                Color color,
                                PPShapeFactory markerFactory)
        Creates a PPGroup shape that contains a complete data series in the line chart. The points are indicated by shapes created by the markerFactory parameter, which should return a shape whose origin is at the center of the figure.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of values in chart space
        color - The color of the line
        markerFactory - The factory that create the marker shape
        Returns:
        The shape corresponding to the data series

      • addDataSeries

        public PPGroup addDataSeries(double[] values,
                             Color color,
                             String options)
        Adds a PPGroup shape that contains a complete data series in the line chart. The points are indicated by shapes created using the option string, which consists of a marker name followed by an option string used to set other properties.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of values in chart space
        color - The color of the line
        options - The options string used to construct the mark
        Returns:
        The shape corresponding to the data series

      • createDataSeries

        public PPGroup createDataSeries(double[] values,
                                Color color,
                                String options)
        Creates a PPGroup shape that contains a complete data series in the line chart. The points are indicated by shapes created using the option string, which consists of a marker name followed by an option string used to set other properties.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of values in chart space
        color - The color of the line
        options - The options string used to construct the mark
        Returns:
        The shape corresponding to the data series

      • setLineWeight

        public void setLineWeight(double weight)
        Sets the weight of the data lines in the chart.
        Parameters:
        weight - The weight of the data lines in the chart

      • getLineWeight

        public double getLineWeight()
        Gets the weight of the data lines in the chart.
        Returns:
